type: Supply And delivery of white cedar shingles
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Parks Canada's requirement for the supply and delivery of eastern white cedar shingles B to CSA standard.
description: There's an update that needs to be accounted for; to disregard the current postings response deadline and Canada Buys posting closing time. All required documents and bids must be submitted for the supply , delivery, the requirement for the supply and delivery of either thick cut Air-dried (green) eastern white cedar shingles or Western red cedar shingles to CSA 0118.1 standard. requirement for the supply and delivery of either thick cut Air-dried (green) eastern white cedar shingles or Western red cedar shingles to CSA 0118.1 standard. Delivery Point: Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site, 5925 Main Street (Provincial Trunk Highway 9), St. Andrews, MB, R1A 4A8.,
